医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
CB1R抑制显示了保护肠道屏障免受酒精损害的希望大量饮酒是胃肠道疾病的主要原因，饮酒与肠道通透性的增加有关 - 通常称为“肠道肠道”的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/cb1r-inbionition-shows-shows-promise-in-promise-inpotecting-gut-barrier-from-alchol-archol-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/cb1r-inbionition-shows-shows-promise-promise-in-promise-inpotecting-gut-barrier-from-alcohol-alcohol-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=647775fec-1D61-4D9A-A09E-B536510E1660 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:17:10 -0400 CB1R inhibition shows promise in protecting gut barrier from alcohol damage
小肠随着小鼠的妊娠而生长弗朗西斯·克里克学院（Francis Crick Institute）的研究人员发现，小肠响应小鼠的妊娠而生长。这种部分不可逆的变化可能有助于小鼠支持怀孕并准备一秒钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/small-intestine-grows-in-response-to-to-pregnancy-to-pregnancy-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/small-intestine-grows-in-response-to-to-pregn-to-pregnancy-in-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f072ae80-e479-479-4e93-a9aa-aacee9304bbe Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:08:59 -0400 Small intestine grows in response to pregnancy in mice
澳大利亚科学家重新定义饮食纤维分类，以获得更好的健康益处澳大利亚食品科学家对饮食纤维进行了重新分类，而不仅仅是可溶性和不溶性 - 可以更好地指导营养决策并推动有针对性的健康食品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/australian-scientists-redefine-define-dietary-fiber-classification-for-better-better-better-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/australian-scientists-redefine-define-dietary-dietary-fiber-classification-for-better-better-better-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61E11E22-AD59-45B1-A5BE-A555555555555FC19F020 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:03:18 -0400 Australian scientists redefine dietary fiber classification for better health benefits
ACL手术后的膝关节运动改变可能导致早发膝关节骨关节炎一些患有前诱因重建（ACLR）的人经常在运动员的膝盖上进行手术，可能会出现早发膝关节骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/Altered-knee-joint-movement-movter-after-after-acl-scl-s-------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/Altered-knee-joint-moverm-movter-after-after-acl-scolgery-could-combontribute-to-contribute-to-early-notly-notly-knee-knee-osteoarthrthrishis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26faa805-e058-4129-8394-0978e5cf7e Wed, 19 Mar 2025 10:32:50 -0400 Altered knee joint movement after ACL surgery could contribute to early-onset knee osteoarthritis
痴呆症的老年移民和移民面临着芬兰社会和医疗服务的相互联系的障碍东芬兰大学最近的一项研究表明，在芬兰，痴呆症患有痴呆症的老年移民和移民获得社会和医疗服务的障碍是相互联系的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/older-migrants-and-and-migrants-and-migrants-with-dementia-face-inter-interconnected-anternected-connected-barriers-to-social-and-cocial-and-Medical-services-in-finland.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/20250319/older-migrants-and-and-migrants-and-mmigrants-with-dementia-face-inter-internected-internected-internected-incocial-to-social-and-cocial-and-Medical-services-in-finland.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5724fc55-445a-4615a-4615-B2B8-0BD6789B36EC Wed, 19 Mar 2025 10:24:48 -0400 Older immigrants and immigrants with dementia face interconnected barriers to social and medical services in Finland
电子香烟可能对艾滋病毒患者带来较低的心血管风险新的由UCLA领导的研究表明，与烟草烟相比，使用电子烟的使用可能会构成较低的心血管风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/electronic-cigarettes-may-pose-pose-lower-cardiascular-cardiscular-forp--------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/electronic-cigarettes-may-pose-pose-lower-cardiascular-cardiscular-------------------------------with-hiv.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9EF3897-2DF8-4889-AC75-4F5E8C52EED7 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 10:02:17 -0400 Electronic cigarettes may pose lower cardiovascular risks for people with HIV
癌症患者的护理人员面临的PTSD率很高每年，数百万人的家庭成员和朋友都会为接受癌症治疗的亲人提供照顾，通常会以巨大的情感成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/caregivers-of-cancer-patients-patients-face-face-high-rates-of-ptsd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/caregivers-of-cancer-patients-patients-face-face-high-rates-face-ptsd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx？id=099999999999999999999999999999999904-B904-BC06D050540E Wed, 19 Mar 2025 09:50:52 -0400 Caregivers of cancer patients face high rates of PTSD
比较伦敦和东京青少年的心理健康轨迹该研究发表在《柳叶刀儿童与青少年健康》中，旨在通过比较伦敦和东京的11至16岁的大型样本在两个不同的文化背景下对青少年心理健康轨迹的良好见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/comparing-mental-health-trajectores-of-teenagers-of-teenagers-in-london-and-tokyo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/comparing-mental-health-trajectores-of-teenagers-of-teenagers-in-london-and-tokyo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afca830f-dcd1-4ef3-A374-5F7731CA36DA Wed, 19 Mar 2025 09:36:08 -0400 Comparing mental health trajectories of teenagers in London and Tokyo
研究表明，风险行为的下降和青少年抑郁症的增加在1999年至2021年之间，美国青少年稳步避免了诸如药物使用和暴力等危险行为，并报告了风险行为和心理健康症状的结合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/research-shows-nows-decline-in-risky-behaviors-and-behaviors-and-rise-in-depression-nepression-among-among-adecents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/research-shows-nows-decline-in-risky-behaviors-and-behaviors-and-rise-in-depression-nepression-among-among-adecents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A92AB549-9273-4A71-B3CB-72F6C3888864D Wed, 19 Mar 2025 09:11:03 -0400 Research shows decline in risky behaviors and rise in depression among adolescents
植物性饮食和IBD这项研究强调了基于植物的饮食与降低IBD风险之间的联系，这表明饮食选择在管理慢性炎症中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/plant-lase-diets-and-and-ibd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/plant-iped-diets-ands-and-ibd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=088D8576-49A0-45C1-BF2B-215E65C966AA Wed, 19 Mar 2025 08:43:00 -0400 Plant-based diets and IBD
